name: Royal Blue Kanjivaram Silk
desc: A magnificent Royal Blue Kanjivaram silk saree with intricate gold zari borders. Perfect for weddings and grand occasions.
reviews: Absolutely stunning quality. The zari work is real gold.

name: Crimson Red Banarasi
desc: Traditional Banarasi weave in deep crimson red. Features floral motifs all over the body.
reviews: The color is exactly as shown in the picture.
Heavy and rich look. Loved it!

name: Summer Peach Cotton Print
desc: Lightweight and breathable cotton saree, ideal for daily wear in summer. Elegant floral block prints.
reviews: Very soft material, comfortable for office wear.
